pipeline_summary.name: check_pcd_sftp_folder_pipeline
pipeline_summary.description: Staged ETL pipeline for Primary Care Data (PCD) processing with folder validation, parallel API extraction, Kubernetes‑based processing and email notification.

components.name: Check PCD SFTP Folder
components.description: Verifies the availability and contents of the SFTP folder before starting the ETL process. Uses a Kubernetes job defined by a template.

components.name: Check PCD Shared Folder
components.description: Validates accessibility of the shared folder after the SFTP check. Executed via a Kubernetes job template.

upstream_policy.description: Runs after successful SFTP folder check.

components.name: Extract PCD API Data
components.description: Calls a configured PCD HTTP API endpoint via POST, validates a 200 status code, and returns the JSON payload.

upstream_policy.description: Executes after the shared folder check succeeds.

components.name: Process and Load PCD Data
components.description: Runs the main ETL Kubernetes job that processes all extracted API data and uploads the resulting dataset.

upstream_policy.description: Triggers after all API extraction tasks complete successfully.

components.name: Send ETL Notification
components.description: Sends email notifications summarizing the ETL run, with separate content for success and failure, including details of any failed tasks.

upstream_policy.description: Executes regardless of upstream success or failure, using an all_done trigger rule.

description.default: Staged ETL pipeline for Primary Care Data (PCD) processing with folder validation, parallel API extraction, Kubernetes‑based processing and email notification.

batch_window.description: Batch window parameter name (e.g., ds, execution_date)

partitioning.description: Data partitioning strategy (e.g., daily, hourly, monthly)

depends_on_past.description: Whether execution depends on previous run success

job_template_file.description: Kubernetes job template for SFTP folder validation

wait_until_job_complete.description: Whether to wait for the Kubernetes job to finish before proceeding

job_template_file.description: Kubernetes job template for shared folder validation

wait_until_job_complete.description: Whether to wait for the Kubernetes job to finish before proceeding

method.description: HTTP method used for API calls
method.constraints: Must be a valid HTTP verb

endpoint_url.description: Target API endpoint URL (populated from Airflow Variables such as pcd_*_url)
endpoint_url.constraints: Must be a reachable HTTP(S) URL

payload.description: Standardized JSON payload sent with each POST request

response_check.description: Expression to validate that the HTTP response status code equals 200

job_template_file.description: Kubernetes job template for the main ETL processing and data upload

trigger_rule.description: Airflow trigger rule ensuring the task runs regardless of upstream success/failure

email_success_list.description: Variable containing the list of recipients for successful run notifications

email_failure_list.description: Variable containing the list of recipients for failure alerts

email_content_template.description: HTML template used to generate the notification body, includes environment context and timestamps

PCD_EMTYSFTP_JOB.description: Kubernetes job template file for checking the PCD SFTP folder

PCD_EMTYDIR_JOB.description: Kubernetes job template file for checking the PCD shared folder

PCD_JOB.description: Kubernetes job template for the main ETL processing and data upload

PCD_ETL_SCHEDULE.description: Cron expression or preset that defines the dynamic schedule for the PCD ETL pipeline

PCD_ETL_EMAIL_LIST_SUCCESS.description: Comma‑separated list of email addresses to receive success notifications

ETL_EMAIL_LIST_ALERTS.description: Comma‑separated list of email addresses to receive failure alerts

AIRFLOW_URL.description: Base URL of the Airflow webserver, used in notification links

PCD_FINANCIAL_EXPENSE_URL.description: Endpoint URL for the Financial Expense API

PCD_UPCC_FINANCIAL_REPORTING_URL.description: Endpoint URL for the UPCC Financial Reporting API

PCD_CHC_FINANCIAL_REPORTING_URL.description: Endpoint URL for the CHC Financial Reporting API

PCD_PCN_FINANCIAL_REPORTING_URL.description: Endpoint URL for the PCN Financial Reporting API

PCD_NPPCC_FINANCIAL_REPORTING_URL.description: Endpoint URL for the NPPCC Financial Reporting API

PCD_FISCAL_YEAR_REPORTING_DATES_URL.description: Endpoint URL for Fiscal Year Reporting Dates API

PCD_UPCC_PRIMARY_CARE_PATIENT_SERVICES_U.description: Endpoint URL for UPCC Primary Care Patient Services API

PCD_CHC_PRIMARY_CARE_PATIENT_SERVICES_UR.description: Endpoint URL for CHC Primary Care Patient Services API

PCD_PRACTITIONER_ROLE_MAPPING_URL.description: Endpoint URL for Practitioner Role Mapping API

PCD_STATUS_TRACKER_URL.description: Endpoint URL for Status Tracker API

PCD_HR_RECORDS_URL.description: Endpoint URL for HR Records API

PCD_PROVINCIAL_RISK_TRACKING_URL.description: Endpoint URL for Provincial Risk Tracking API

PCD_DECISION_LOG_URL.description: Endpoint URL for Decision Log API

PCD_HA_HIERARCHY_URL.description: Endpoint URL for Health Authority Hierarchy API

PCD_UPPC_BUDGET_URL.description: Endpoint URL for UPCC Budget API

PCD_CHC_BUDGET_URL.description: Endpoint URL for CHC Budget API

PCD_PCN_BUDGET_URL.description: Endpoint URL for PCN Budget API

PCD_NPPCC_BUDGET_URL.description: Endpoint URL for NPPCC Budget API

connections.name: UPCC Primary Care Patient Services API
CHC Primary Care Patient Services API

sources: PCD SFTP folder containing raw inbound files
Shared network folder used for intermediate staging
18 distinct HTTP API endpoints providing PCD data (financial, reporting, patient services, role mapping, status, HR, risk, decision logs, hierarchy, budgets)
sinks: Processed PCD dataset uploaded by the main Kubernetes ETL job (e.g., to a data lake or warehouse)
Email notifications sent to success or alert distribution lists
